timeline.bodyText: Please remove these comments indicating the CPMEGA should be hidden.

replies.bodyText: GitHub is showing it was not removed (the way you attempted to remove it created a PR that conflicts with this PR). Please remove it by editing the file at this link: https://github.com/adeak1rr/JMRI/blob/patch-1/java/src/jmri/jmrix/cmri/serial/nodeconfigmanager/NodeConfigManagerFrame.java
